Load libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
metadata <- read_csv("../data/metadata.csv")
head(metadata)
```

```{r}
mk_metadata <- metadata %>%
  select(DATE, SEASON, HOLIDAYPX, HOLIDAYN, WDWMAXTEMP, WDWMINTEMP, WDWMEANTEMP, HOLIDAYJ, MKOPEN, MKCLOSE, MKEMHOPEN, MKEMHCLOSE, WEATHER_WDWPRECIP, MKPRDDT1, MKPRDDT2, MKPRDNT1, MKPRDNT2, MKFIRET1, MKFIRET2)
ep_metadata <- metadata %>%
  select(DATE, SEASON, HOLIDAYPX, HOLIDAYN, WDWMAXTEMP, WDWMINTEMP, WDWMEANTEMP, HOLIDAYJ, EPOPEN, EPCLOSE, EPEMHOPEN, EPEMHCLOSE, WEATHER_WDWPRECIP, EPFIRET1, EPFIRET2)
hs_metadata <- metadata %>%
  select(DATE, SEASON, HOLIDAYPX, HOLIDAYN, WDWMAXTEMP, WDWMINTEMP, WDWMEANTEMP, HOLIDAYJ, HSOPEN, HSCLOSE, HSEMHOPEN, HSEMHCLOSE, WEATHER_WDWPRECIP, HSPRDDT1, HSFIRET1, HSFIRET2, HSSHWNT1, HSSHWNT2)
ak_metadata <- metadata %>%
  select(DATE, SEASON, HOLIDAYPX, HOLIDAYN, WDWMAXTEMP, WDWMINTEMP, WDWMEANTEMP, HOLIDAYJ, AKOPEN, AKCLOSE, AKEMHOPEN, AKEMHCLOSE, WEATHER_WDWPRECIP, AKPRDDT1, AKPRDDT2, AKSHWNT1, AKSHWNT2)
head(mk_metadata)
head(ep_metadata)
head(hs_metadata)
head(ak_metadata)
```
